properties.Name: Aquarius On The Beach
properties.description: Set on Wailoaloa Beach, this relaxed hotel is 1 km from Nadi International Airport and 6 km from Sri Siva Subramaniya temple. Featuring tropical decor, the simple dorms have free Wi-Fi and in-suite bathrooms. Private rooms add tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded quarters offer flat-screen TVs; some have balconies.

properties.Name: Bamboo Backpackers
properties.description: Basic mixed and female-only dorms, some with bay views, sleep up to 16 people. All feature free Wi-Fi, bunk beds, fans and shared bathrooms. Upgraded dorms add air-conditioning. Private rooms are available; some provide minifridges, tea and coffeemakers, balconies and/or en suite facilities.

properties.Name: Beachouse
properties.description: The Beachouse is one of Fiji's best kept secrets! This relaxed beach retreat located on the Coral Coast provides a unique experience and is a favorite for both returnees and those new to Fiji. The resort caters for global travelers and holiday makers fostering a more authentic Fijian experience than offered by the larger resorts.

properties.Name: Colo-i-Suva Rainforest Eco Resort
properties.description: Warm accommodations in an exotic tropical resort offering a restaurant, a bar & an outdoor pool.

properties.Name: Bluewater Lodge
properties.description: Relaxed rooms in a quaint lodging featuring an outdoor pool, lush gardens & massage facilities.

properties.Name: Horizon Beach Hostel
properties.description: Horizon is a well-established Backpacker hostel that has become a mecca for backpackers and independent travelers alike. Centrally located by the beach at Nadi Bay & only 10 minutes drive from the International Airport & Nadi Town, Horizon has a happening party atmosphere where travelers feel at lodging.

properties.Name: Grand Pacific Hotel
properties.description: In an elegant 1914 building and a modern annex, this upscale hotel on the oceanfront is 13 minutes' walk from the Fiji Museum and a 4-minute walk from Thurston Gardens.

properties.Name: Raintree Lodge
properties.description: Offers Suvaâ€™s best budget accommodation on the edge of the rainforest. Staff are fantastically friendly, the atmosphere relaxed and restaraunt superb.

properties.Name: Stone Bowl Lodge
properties.description: Stone Bowl Lodge is a locally owned colonial and affordable accommodation based in the interior of Nadarivatu, Viti Levu. The Nadarivatu region is home to eco valley vegetable farming, bird watching, stunning scenery, walks, village visit and trek Mt Victoria, the highest peak in Fiji.

properties.Name: Smuggler's Cove
properties.description: Bright, straightforward rooms and mixed or all-female dorms have en suite bathrooms and free Wi-Fi. Dorms offer bunk beds and lockers, while private rooms add TVs and balconies with ocean views.

properties.Name: Safari Lodge
properties.description: Safari Lodge is focused on passive recreational sports. We don't have Jet Skis, drag net fishing, or encourage clients taking our precious resources, in particular our marine life on the reefs.

properties.Name: Uprising Beach Resort
properties.description: This relaxed resort, set on Palm Beach and looking out over Rovodrau Bay, is a 15-minute walk from Pacific Harbour Arts Village and 13 miles from Kila Eco-Adventure Park.
